com.skoev.timer
Class ScreenLocker

java.lang.Object
  com.skoev.timer.ScreenLocker

public class ScreenLocker
extends java.lang.Object

Class responsible for storing the screen-lock keyboard shortcut and pressing it programmatically. Used by TimerControl

Field Summary
private  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> currentShortcut
          Current keyboard shortcut for screen locking; initialized to the default shortcut but then user can change it.
private static java.lang.Integer[] DEFAULT_SHORTCUT
          Default keyboard shortcut for screen locking is Ctrl-Alt-L
private  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> keysPressed
          Used to stores the keystrokes hit so far by the user after the TimerPanel.beginRecording has been pressed.
private  java.awt.Robot robot
          Object providing programmtatic control of the keyboard.
